snippet: The Elite Football League of India, a curious venture aimed at introducing the American sport to South Asia, has a low level of play but a large potential audience.
abstract: Elite Football League of India aims to introduce American football to India, Pakistan, Sri Lanka and other Asian countries where game is almost completely unknown; venture could prove lucrative, as area has vast population of potential fans.

byline.original: By VIKAS BAJAJ and KEN BELSON
byline.contributor: Vikas Bajaj reported from Mumbai, India, and Ken Belson from New York. Neha Thirani contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The Elite Football League of India, a curious venture aimed at introducing the American sport to South Asia, has a low level of play but a large potential audience.

headline.seo: Professional Football Makes a Play for India
headline.main: Pro Football Makes a Play for India

keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
keywords.name: glocations
